FuncDef:
The ds-lite alarm port-number address-group disable command enables the log and alarm functions for DS-Lite user port usage.
The ds-lite alarm port-number user enable command enables the log and alarm functions for DS-Lite user port usage.
The undo ds-lite alarm port-number address-group disable command disables the log and alarm functions for DS-Lite user port usage.
The undo ds-lite alarm port-number user enable command disables the log and alarm functions for DS-Lite user port usage.
By default, the log and alarm functions of port usage of a DS-Lite public IP address pool are enabled, the log and alarm functions for DS-Lite user port usage are disabled.
CLIs: ds-lite alarm port-number { log | trap } address-group disable
ds-lite alarm port-number { log | trap } [ load-balance ] user enable
undo ds-lite alarm port-number { log | trap } address-group disable
undo ds-lite alarm port-number { log | trap } [ load-balance ] user enable

ParaDef.Info:
Enables or disables the log function for the port usage of DS-Lite users.
Enables or disables the log function for the port usage of a public address pool.
-

Enables or disables the alarm function for the port usage of DS-Lite users.
Enables or disables the trap function for the port usage of a public address pool.
-

Examples: [*HUAWEI-ds-lite-instance-cpe1] ds-lite alarm port-number log user enable
[*HUAWEI-ds-lite-instance-cpe1] ds-lite alarm port-number log address-group disable
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To monitor the port usage of the public address pool, run the ds-lite alarm port-number address-group disable command in the NAT instance view to control whether the device sends an alarm upon port usage threshold-crossing of the public address pool and whether the alarm is cleared when the port usage decreases to 87.5% of the alarm threshold.
By default, the log and alarm functions for DS-Lite user port usage are disabled. To monitor DS-Lite user port usage, run the ds-lite alarm port-number user enable command to enable the log and alarm functions for DS-Lite user port usage.
Precautions
The ds-lite alarm port-number address-group disable command is applicable only to the NAT address pool in non-easy IP mode.
This command is applicable only to the VSUF-80/VSUF-160/VSUI-160-E/VSUI-400/VSUI-400-E/VSUI-400A/VSUI-400A-E/VSUI-400-S/VSUI-400A-S.
